page.title: 13ATHERSLEY SCHOOL THEFTS
page.content:
Out of fifteen schools in the Athersley and Mapplewell area only two have not been entered. There has been damage done inside at eleven of the schools entered. Most damage has been done to doors, but other school property has been damaged. These eleven schools have had equipment stolen, the most expensive property being videos, stereos and computers. Smaller items have been stolen also.
Ten of the schools have had the vandals caught. Measures taken to deter vandals include alarm systems and anti-vandal red paint. Some schools are patrolled by a community policeman. Caretakers who live by the school are also a deterrent.
